thread.title: Terranova appoints sales executive Roch Cousineau as new Chief Revenue Officer to drive innovation and growth in global security market

author: cnbc.com
title: Terranova appoints sales executive Roch Cousineau as new Chief Revenue Officer to drive innovation and growth in global security market
text:
MONTREAL, March 16, 2018 /PRNewswire/ - Leader in the field of Information Security Awareness (ISA) and Phishing Simulation, Terranova Worldwide Corporation announces the appointment of sales executive Roch Cousineau in the role of Chief Revenue Officer. Following a recent $5 million capital injection by the Fonds de solidarit√© FTQ, Mr. Cousineau joins Terranova with a wealth of experience to spearhead its international expansion and oversee the execution of the company's strategic objectives.
As commented by company founder and CEO Lise Lapointe: "We are thrilled to welcome Roch to the team. With his versatile background in sales, IT and cybersecurity, along with his uplifting energy, Roch will be an important contributor to our company's growth. Innovation is at the core of our solutions and as such, his insight into the market will sharpen Terranova's sales and marketing initiatives."
Mr. Cousineau sees the need for a paradigm shift in IT security: "As employees are increasingly becoming the most effective vector of attacks through social-engineering techniques, some of the IT security efforts and investment budgeted for technology-based solutions should shift to the people part of the equation. At Terranova, we have the content, the framework and the platforms necessary to implement a truly impactful security awareness campaign. In fact, we believe that the actual end goal is to move your personnel along the adoption continuum: from awareness to alertness, so that they adopt new behaviours and are always ready and able to fend off attacks aimed at them. At Terranova, we help our clients put everyone on the right course!"
With a BSc in Computer Science, a Master in Business Demonstration and over 30 years of experience in IT with multinational organizations, Chief Revenue Officer Roch Cousineau brings a unique blend of savoir-faire to solidify Terranova's position as a global leader in ISA and increase the adoption of the company's people-centric, adaptable and scalable solutions.
About Terranova WW Corporation
Recognized in Gartner's Magic Quadrant, Terranova develops comprehensive e-learning solutions for information security awareness. We successfully accompany security professionals in creating smart learning opportunities for end users regarding security and cyber-risks. We help measure employee-related vulnerabilities in real-time, fulfill compliance requirements, and monitor improvements over time. Our solutions positively change information security behaviors. Owing to our multilingual and multicultural approach, we are renowned for providing outstanding support to organizations globally.
http://www.terranovacorporation.com
SOURCE Terranova Worldwide Corporation
